name: Lost Minotaur
description: The Lost Minotaur is a large undead creature with a massive frame and a twisted appearance, wielding a large Twilight Greataxe.
memorable: Its ability to sense living creatures from a mile away and the devastating charge attack make it a menacing presence.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate the battlefield and eliminate foes using brute strength and special abilities.
relations: Can be found near other undead creatures or in locations tied to dark magic.
environment: Commonly found in dark, abandoned places or ruins, where it hunts for living beings.
strengths: High physical attack power, magical resistance, and abilities that enhance its battlefield control.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and has low intelligence for tactical planning.
attacks: Employs powerful melee attacks with a greataxe and gore, dealing slashing, necrotic, and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Charge allows it to deal extra damage and potentially knock targets prone.
senses: Has keen smell, granting advantage on perception checks that rely on scent.
skills: Proficient in athletics, perception, and survival, enhancing its ability to track and engage in physical challenges.
additional_information: Immune to cold and poison damage
Condition immunities include charmed and frightened
Can sense living creatures within a one-mile radius
Low charisma making it ineffective in social interactions
test_queries: powerful undead monster with keen smell
monster that senses living creatures nearby
